user.title: Create WLED Live View Proxy
user.description:
Set up a proxy to receive Live View from your WLED device via WebSocket.

Provide the device's IP address and specify whether to enable basic light control and immediate availability notifications.

data_description.wled_ip: Enter the IP address of your WLED device (e.g., 192.168.1.100)
data_description.control: Determines if basic light control and real-time availability notifications are enabled.

data_description.wled_ip: IP address used for Live View from the WLED device
data_description.control: Enables basic light control and immediate availability notifications when active.
